content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --DTC
      operator: non_empty
    - name: --ENDTC
      operator: non_empty
    - name: --DTC
      operator: date_greater_than
      value: --ENDTC
Core:
  Id: FDA.VALIDATOR.SD0025
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Raise an error when --DTC is after --ENDTC
Outcome:
  Message: --DTC is after --ENDTC
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: FDA
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: FDA Validator Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: SD0025, Publisher ID FDAB034
              Version: '1'
            Version: '1.5'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Date/Time of Specimen Collection (--DTC) must be less
                  or equal to End Date/Time of Specimen Collection (--ENDTC).
                Document: FDA Validator Rules v1.5
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
      - FINDINGS ABOUT
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Raise an error when --DTC is after --ENDTC

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Date/Time of Specimen Collection (--DTC) must be less or equal to End Date/Time of Specimen Collection (--ENDTC).
